allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project rules and Electron architecture skill

Initialize project with comprehensive guidelines and custom skill
for AI agents working on Electron applications.

- Add AGENTS.md with Git, code quality, and security rules
- Add electron-architecture skill with best practices
- Add skill-creator for creating additional skills
- Configure Claude Code settings and permissions

The Electron architecture skill provides:
- Process architecture patterns \(main/renderer/preload\)
- Secure IPC communication examples
- Code organization and directory structure
- Security best practices and checklists
- Architecture planning templates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
